title: Circle of the Moon
content:
, twisted thorns surrounded by Entangling vines.

18m DEX SaveConcentration

You and everyone around can't be poisoned, diseased, or frightened. Your HP increases, and you make Wisdom Saves with Advantage.

70 HealingHeal a target's wounds and remove Blindness and any diseases.

No affect on undead and constructs.

Transform yourself and all nearby party members into tiny clouds of mist to avoid attacks.

While transformed, you won't be able to attack, cast, spells, or talk.
